text: A breed is a domesticated race or type of an animal or plant. The term may also be used as a verb. In this way, to breed an animal is to make sure that it has descendants that improve the next generationâ€™s qualities. This is also often referred to as breeding. A breeder is a person who maintains and creates different breeds of animals or plants. Methods include inbreeding and crossbreeding. ==Common breeds== *List of cat breeds *List of dog breeds *Plant breeding ==Related pages== * Variety (plant) * Race (biology) * Selective breeding Category:Animal husbandry Category:Genetics
title: Breed
